price: (Yusufu) aravuga ati “Allah aturinde kuba twagira undi dufata usibye uwo twasanganye umutungo wacu. Mu by’ukuri (turamutse tubikoze) icyo gihe twaba tubaye inkozi z’ibibi.”
arabic: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدۡنَا مَتَٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla maʿādha al-lahi an nakhudha illā man wajadnā matāʿanā ʿindahu innā idhan laẓālimūna
